name: EuroLanguages
overview:
This site allows you to compare and book language courses in the countries in which the language is natively spoken. This means you can learn through total immersion, one of the most effective and enjoyable ways to learn a language.

Along with the adventure and traveling come all the benefits of being able to speak with the locals, experience the culture, meet new people and optionally live with local families.

Courses run from 1 to 12 weeks all year round and you can easily compare them by price and student reviews. There is also an interesting range of activities that you can take with your language course, including surfing, skiing, cooking, dancing and many more.
